name: Walljump Lawnmower
description:
WALLJUMP LAWNMOWER
Game made in one weekend for GMTK Jam.

How to play:

  • Menu: [WASD] or [Arrows]
  • Jump: [Space] or [Enter] or (L-Click)
  • Jumping changes your direction.
  • Mow all the grass to clear each level!

Credits:

  • Art and code by Jason Perry (finalbossblues). 
  • Music by James Wilkinson (Overkillius).
  • Sound effects by U-GameZ (sound pack downloaded from itch.io).
